name: Ariel (The Little Mermaid) Princess Disney, by YeiyeiArt
description:
Ariel is a well-known Disney character from The Little Mermaid. To create the Lora, a meticulously selected and refined DataSet was used to achieve a versatile and flexible model. So that it adapts perfectly to styles and models. It also works in 3D. Use the keyword “(ArielWaifu:1)” for greater precision, and I also recommend using the keywords “(shell bikini), (Mermaid tail), (pink dress, tiara), (Blue dress, corset, hair bow) to invoke her characteristic outfits. If you want to change her outfit, I recommend lowering the weight of the Lora between “0.8 - 0.5” for greater flexibility, try it out and have fun. Remember to leave a Review with an image if you liked it and comment!! HAVE FUN :D

Don’t forget to check out my other Disney Series Loras on my profile. Currently Rapunzel, Snow White, Merida, Cinderella, Pocahontas, Fa Mulan, Elsa, Anna, Tiana and Alice in Wonderland, Ariel!! From the Princess Series ;D” Also u have The Bonus Series with: Nani Pelekai, Lifeguard (lilo & stitch). And Tinker bell, Jane Porter (Tarzan),

NOTES: Sometimes the mermaid tail looks strange in specific pose, the best results that i can noticed is with "lying poses" or "on side". try by yourself, have fun!! ;D

ADVICE!! “If you want a commission of something in particular, whether it’s a style or a character on request, contact me via email: jeanc.romero.ib@gmail.com.”
